name: Golden Demon Raining Ice Cubes
description:
Hell is raining ice cubes! Move left and right to dodge the ice cubes and see how long you can last.

WASD or arrow keys to move

If you find the game laggy then you can use P to toggle the ice cube particles on or off.

This game was made with python pygame.

Made for Mini Jam 120 with the theme of hell.
